attributes.action: In 1985 we came together for Live aid Let's do it again for the NHS. In 2021,
attributes.additional_details: You are in a position to ask these people to help. Everyone supports the NHS now in our time of need but once the crisis is over it will be yesterday's news, until the next time! It will also give the people something to work and look forward. Maybe even encourage people to STAY IN DOORS NOW.
attributes.background: Encourage the music/entertainment industry to support the NHS . In 1985 Live Aid raised millions for the African continent now is he time to do something for our country to say 'Thank you'

rejection.details: This would be a matter for the music/entertainment industry
